PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2018-12482018-10-04NRCAN,  ,  ,  , 
ActEnergy Efficiency Act
SubjectRegulations Amending the Energy Efficiency Regulations, 2016
PrecisRegulations Amending the ENERGY EFFICIENCY REGULATIONS, 2016 in order to (1) introduce or improve minimum energy performance standards across 17 product categories; (2) reduce green house gas emissions and energy consumption associated with using those products; and (3) reduce unnecessary regulatory differences between Canadian and United States regulations across new and existing product categories to support cross-border trade.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2018-0201 Publication Date: 2018-10-31
AttachmentsAttachment
